snippet.title: Creepy Shift: House For Sale - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Vol. 2 of the 'CREEPY SHIFT' series based on bloody creepypastas.😈
Coming soon on Steam👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3400650/Creepy_Shift_House_For_Sale/

HOW IT WORKS: 
 ► Take an extra gig at a haunted house.
 ► Do all your duties.
 ► Solve mysterious puzzles and try to survive until dawn.

JOIN US:
► Discord: https://discord.gg/N2uZcsSD
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedLimbStudio
► X: https://x.com/333Creepyshift 

"My father was a quiet man by nature, just like me — I finally broke the half-hour silence. He was always fascinated by the earth. He spent hours mapping and exploring areas most people ignored. When I was a kid, he used to tell me about anomalies in the nearby mountains—unnatural rock formations. He said the ground there breathed differently."
